Trade/Device Name(s): Duo-Max Blood Pressure and Glucose Monitor
Blood Pressure and Glucose Monitor, Duo-Max
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Duo-Max Blood Pressure and Glucose Monitor
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Duo-Max Blood Pressure and Glucose Monitor Model HMF-100 for quantitative glucose and blood pressure measurement in home and clinical settings
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood from multiple body sites and for measuring systolic and diastolic blood pressure and pulse rate from adult's wrist in home and clinical environments; not for neonatal use or diabetes diagnosis/screening
